Detailed Description

An object to be placed in a GB scene.

Member Function Documentation

◆ addComponent()

bool rev::SceneObject::addComponent ( Component *  component)

Add component to the scene object.

Returns true if component successfully added

◆ hasComponent()

Component* rev::SceneObject::hasComponent ( ComponentType  type,
uint32_t  idx = 0 
) const
inline

Whether the object has the given component type or not.

Returns nullptr if doesn't have the component, otherwise returns the first component of the given type

◆ namespaceName()

const char* rev::SceneObject::namespaceName ( ) const
inlineoverridevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

◆ worldBounds()

const BoundingBoxes& rev::SceneObject::worldBounds ( ) const
inline

Animation bounds in world space.

Bounds are calculated via updateBounds method by transforming skeleton's bounding box into world space

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_components

std::vector<std::vector<Component*> > rev::SceneObject::m_components
protected

The components attached to this scene object.

Main map is indexed by component type, key for sub-map is UUID
